title: William Primrose: a violist's legacy
creator_credit: Mark D Collier, Brigham Young University and KBYU-TV
brief_description: A biographical documentary on Scottish born classical musician, William Primrose, who first studied the violin but very soon changed to the viola and became one of the world’s leading viola players, renowned as a soloist and chamber musician. In this documentary video, recorded at Brigham Young University, William Primrose reminisces about his past with host Dr David Dalton, accompanied by stills, archival footage and additional biographical material from William Primrose’s autobiography, “Walk on the North Side”.
